players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I saw Bob last night and he seemed fine. I have no idea what happened to him."
Diana: "Bob seemed fine last night, I saw him too. I'm not sure what happened to him either."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
